thread.title: Gov. Brown signs bill requiring search warrants on electronic data
thread.title_full: Gov. Brown signs bill requiring search warrants on electronic data - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Bob Egelko
title: Gov. Brown signs bill requiring search warrants on electronic data
text: Gov. Jerry Brown signed legislation Thursday that will require police in California to obtain a warrant from a judge before searching any electronic communications, including e-mails, text messages, GPS data and other location information.
